abstract_ssm: The Reverend William I. Chalmers served as pastor of the Congregational church in Riverhead, New York, during the late 19th century. The collection includes two manuscripts written and presented by Chalmers in the 1890s concerning the history of Congregationalism in Suffolk County, N.Y.
subject_ssm: Congregational churches -- New York (State) -- Long Island

subject_sim: Congregational churches -- New York (State) -- Long Island
